recommended_questions: Who funds {name}'s campaign, and in what approximate amounts?
What false or misleading public claims has {name} made in the last 30 days?
What does {name}'s social media history reveal about their behavior and conduct?
What major controversies, scandals, or ethical concerns have surrounded {name}?
Does {name} have a criminal record, history of bankruptcy, or any other significant legal issues?
What conflicts of interest exist between {name}'s public role and their financial, business, or personal ties?
What is {name}'s long-term record of truthfulness, accuracy, and public credibility?
Who materially or politically benefits the most from {name}'s agenda?
Who is most likely to be harmed, excluded, or disadvantaged by {name}'s agenda?
